original_text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen, that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard: but the husbandmen beat him, and sent him away empty.
korean_text: 때가 이르매 포도원 소출 얼마를 바치게 하려고 한 종을 농부들에게 보내니 농부들이 종을 몹시 때리고 거저 보내었거늘

sentences.original_text: he sent a servant to the husbandmen
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 포도원 지기에게 한 종을 보내니

sentences.original_text: that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 포도원의 열매를 그에게 주게 하려 함이라
